name: Rewrite the Star, Vyrgilla
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Energy-Blast 3], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, bind it, choose up to one grade 2 unit card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your grade 2 rear-guards, and [Stand] it.
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS04] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 04: Stardust Blade

name: Shooting Star, Vyrgilla
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If you have four or more rear-guards, [COST][reveal a card with "Vyrgilla" in its card name from ride deck], and this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 card from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If it was rode upon by a grade 3 or greater card with "Vyrgilla" in its card name, look at all of the deck instead of the top seven cards.
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS04] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 04: Stardust Blade

name: Rising Star, Vyrgilla
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 for each of your rear-guards.
[CONT](VC):When you would ride from ride deck, you can ride with "[Soul-Blast 1]" instead of "choose a card from hand, and discard it".
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS04] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 04: Stardust Blade

name: Vyrgilla
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Stardust Blade
effect:
Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1] if you have a vanguard with "Vyrgilla" in its card name!

Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck. Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard is retired by your opponent's card's ability, search your deck for up to one normal unit, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck." and "[CONT](VC):This unit gets [Power] +3000 for each normal unit on your (RC) and in your drop." until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS04] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 04: Stardust Blade
